TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_zangav, title = zangav, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/zangav} }

S.FORM: aicu a zangav, masaliawliaw izua i pasanavalj tua hangu , ripun, i pasanavalj tua chuku kata i teku a sasusuan tua vavavan na katjunangan i taiwan a cemecemel. aicu a cemel mavanga a vaudj a uri kikerap izua itua kasiw kata qaciljay. sikakudan maqati a kizangav tua sipucemel tua qesang sa natarivak tua vicuka na cawcau. aicu a zangav katua saviki patatauden a temalem. qaw, aza saviki, qavu kata zangav mavan a tjaljapazangalan nua payuwan nu mapuapu tiamadju. saka, izua a saviki, qavu kata zangav nu uri pucekelj kata penaljang a payuwan. uri kakanen taza vuciar na zangav a payuwan avan a putju aya tiamadju. kaizuanan 鄭漢文,王相華,鄭惠芬, .P224.

aico a zangav, masaliawliaw izoa i pasanavalj toa hango , ripon, i pasanavalj toa choko kata i teko a sasosoan toa vavavan na katjonangan i taiwan a cemecemel. aico a cemel mavanga a vaodj a ori kikerap izoa itoa kasiw kata qaciljay. sikakodan maqati a kizangav toa sipocemel toa qesang sa natarivak toa vicoka na cawcao. aico a zangav katoa saviki patataoden a temalem. qaw, aza saviki, qavo kata zangav mavan a tjaljapazangalan noa payowan no mapoapo tiamadjo. saka, izoa a saviki, qavo kata zangav no ori pocekelj kata penaljang a payowan. ori kakanen taza vociar na zangav a payowan avan a potjo aya tiamadjo. kaizoanan 鄭漢文,王相華,鄭惠芬, .P224.
